{{Description|In a corner of [[Port Ormos]]. you and Paimon encounter friends whom you made during inaugural Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament. They are currently preparing for the next tournament, and to that effect have come up with a new game with which to advertise for the Beast Tamers Tournament...}}
'''Fungus Mechanicus''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.5]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/03/23 10:00 - 2023/04/03 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 30 or above
* Complete the [[Archon Quest]] "[[A New Star Approaches]]"
* To get the best experience from this event, complete the Archon Quest "[[Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises]]" first.
** If the player has not completed the Archon Quest "Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises" during the event, they can enter the event through "[[Quick Start]]" in the event page.

===Summary===
* During the event, direct Lil' Fungi to defeat all the Mechanici to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s, and [[Artifact Enhancement Materials]].
* After the event begins, a new stage will unlock on each day for a total of 7 stages.
* Command Lil' Fungi to destroy all Mechanici to win the stage.
* During the combat challenge, consume Marvelous Gels to issue orders to Lil' Fungi to cast powerful abilities. The amount of Marvelous Gels will gradually recover over time, or you can use Plauditory Protection(s) on the field to directly obtain more.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Fungus Mechanicus 1.png
|text1  = During Fungus Mechanicus, beast tamers must direct their Lil' Fungi to defeat all the Mechanici.<br>Your Lil' Fungi will automatically choose the nearest Mechanicus and attack it. You can use the {{Color|help|white indicator lines}} to track the current target each Lil' Fungus has selected.<br>At the same time, the opposing Mechanici will each target the Lil' Fungus closest to it, an intention that can be seen via {{Color|help|red indicator lines}}.
|image2 = Tutorial Fungus Mechanicus 2.png
|text2  = Click on the avatars of the Lil' Fungi, use the number keys, or directly click on the Lil' Fungi on the field to switch between Fungi you control.
|image3 = Tutorial Fungus Mechanicus 3.png
|text3  = Click any spot on the field or an opposing Mechanicus to direct your Lil' Fungus to move to that spot, or to start attacking that Mechanicus.
|image4 = Tutorial Fungus Mechanicus 4.png
|text4  = Use Marvelous Gels to instruct the Lil' Fungi to unleash powerful skills. You will regain Marvelous Gels over time.<br>Additionally, you can use Plauditory Protection(s) on the field to obtain additional Marvelous Gels.
|image5 = Tutorial Fungus Mechanicus 5.png
|text5  = Certain skills must have a target selected before they can be used.
}}
